fields.name: Freak Accident (Passive):
fields.value: Every night, you have three extra abilities. They are: [Random Town Ability] [Random Evil Ability] [Random Ability in general]

fields.name: Dissolve (Charge 100%):
fields.value: Remove one word of your choice from every response. Use this ability in the Day Phase.

fields.name: Combine (1x, Locked):
fields.value: This ability is unlocked when you hit the Top 3. Target a player. You will now be a Hydra with that player, and your role abilities are combined. You gain the win condition of the targetted player. This is not announced publically.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: Complete the wincon of ***Combine***'s target. You can not win before you use Combine.
